about_the_game:
Happy Lane 403 is a first-person psychological horror game set in the nineties in China. Players can experience the life of children in China in the 1990s in the game. However, the protagonist's peaceful life is disrupted by strange events at home. All the strange events and clues point to a truth. Players need to solve puzzles, escape warped space, and dodge terrifying monsters.

Theme

There are no complicated puzzles and operations in this game. Its purpose is to guide players to become aware of the family factors that lead to childhood trauma and its consequences. During the game, players will have access to some relevant information about adverse childhood experiences.

Game Features

Players may find familiar objects in the game and bring back memories of their own childhood. The game contains a lot of details for players to explore.

name: 幸福里403 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible（must support DirectX 9.0c or higher）
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD equivalent

short_description: Happy Lane 403 is a first-person psychological horror game set in the nineties in China. Players will play as a child to explore strange things that happen at home and gradually uncover the truth behind the weird events.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
